author: andrea21z
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is created to remove a module that are not used anymore in production:
`TSGForOI` from `RecoMuon/TrackerSeedGenerator`.

- The issue is described in [#37973](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37973).
- The deprecated module was replaced by `TSGForOIFromL2` in 2018, and this one was replaced in April by `TSGForOIDNN` (`RecoMuon/TrackerSeedGenerator/plugins/TSGForOIDNN.h`).
- Files related with this module have been removed.
- We update the L3MuonProducer [test](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoMuon/L3MuonProducer/test/newL3.py) to run `TSGForOIDNN` instead of `TSGForOI`.

#### PR validation:

The proposed changes passed all code format and runTheMatrix tests.
title: Remove 'TSGForOI' module
